aircraft.value: Ghost Recon - AC-2014-534 at Zone-4 Facility

defect_observed.value: Oil consumption rate increase. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel Injection component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 30/06/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 02/07/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 03/07/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 03/07/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 08/07/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh
